title: One Page Stories - Novel Updates
genre: Horror   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Tragedy
author: Various
description: http://1pagestory.com is an online compilation of short stories by different authors, which was started by a publisher called dae-an. Short stories were collected from volunteers from April 2003 to December 2016 and then published in a magazine. Unfortunately, the project is on hiatus as of January 1st, 2017. However, there are several hundred of these stories already available on the previously mentioned site with genres ranging from horror and action to romance and slice of life.>
